nodeMetric.field_description: Campaign Clicks is a count of the total number of times users clicked on digital advertisements in a campaign. A campaign is a grouping of ads organized by business objective.

body.summary: Campaign Clicks is a count of the total number of times users clicked on digital advertisements in a campaign. A campaign is a grouping of ads organized by business objective.

field_related_metrics.field_description: Campaign Impressions is a count of the total number of times digital advertisements within a campaign are shown. A campaign is a grouping of ads organized by business objective.
Campaign Unique Clicks is a count of the number of people who clicked on your digital advertisements within a campaign at least once. A campaign is a grouping of ads organized by business objective.
Campaign Reach is a count of the number of people who viewed your digital advertisements within a campaign at least once. A campaign is a grouping of ads organized by business objective.
